input.subject: Re: Your moving quote for SF to NYC
input.body:
Hi,

Quote looks good but please remove packing. I'll stick with basic insurance. Delivery address is still TBD.

Thanks,
Jolie

output.subject: Noted: adjustments to your SF to NYC quote
output.body:
Hi Jolie,

Got it—removing packing and keeping basic insurance. We'll update the vendor and keep delivery as TBD for now.

Once we have the revised total, we'll confirm and move forward.

Thanks,
Gullie Agent

input.subject: Approve LA to Seattle quote
input.body:
Hello,

I approve the quote as is and want the upgraded insurance. No packing needed.

Best,
Samir

output.subject: Confirmed: approval for LA to Seattle quote
output.body:
Hi Samir,

Thanks for approving. We'll proceed without packing and add the upgraded insurance. We'll tell the vendor to start and confirm scheduling next.

Thanks,
Gullie Agent

input.subject: Quote feedback
input.body:
Hi,

Can we drop boxes and packing to lower the cost? I'm okay with basic insurance.

Thank you,
Annie

output.subject: Adjusting your Chicago to Austin quote
output.body:
Hi Annie,

We'll remove boxes and packing and keep basic insurance. I'll request an updated total from the vendor and send it over.

Thanks,
Gullie Agent

input.subject: Re: Your moving quote for Boston to Miami
input.body:

Price is fine. Please include packing and add the upgraded insurance.

output.subject: Confirmed options for your Boston to Miami move
